text: Hi, a question on `SparseMatrixCSC` . I have a code (a solver for linear systems) which should have quasilinear complexity in solving linear systems. Unfortunately I have one bottleneck which is extracting submatrices `A[i,j]` from the big sparse matrix. This should be an O(n log n) operation but it seems that the current implementation is infuriatingly slow and O(n^2). I have found some closed threads on discourse but it is unclear what the current status is on that. Any hints?

text: If we don't have an issue about this already, you should file one. If we do, you should bump it. The tldr is if there is a much more efficient method for this, we should be using it.
